name: The Willow Island
description:
The small river island becomes an area of conflict between a mouse village and an army of rats supported by a powerful magic. Will brave adventurers help the villagers? Or have they been lured here by the legends of ancient treasures hidden somewhere on the island? 

The Willow Island is a one-page hexcrawl dedicated for the Mausritter TTRPG. Here you'll find the description of 7 hexes, main factions and tables of random encounters and rumors. You can run this module as a standalone campaign or include it in an ongoing one.

The Willow Island is an independent production by Boodzik and is not affiliated with Losing Games. It is published under the Mausritter Third Party License. Mausritter is copyright Losing Games.
